评论概述: Looks and fits nothing like the picture
评论详情: Wanted a distress, dark, very wide leg jean - like the photo.  Didn't look or fit like that at all.  Also, like others have commented, the button hole was not cut out.  Weird.
Nice jeans my granddaughter loves them

评论概述: To button or to not button!
评论详情: How do you expect the pants to stay up when I can't even button with no hole. Now I have to break out my non sewing skills and fix it or wait weeks for another pair when I needed them for this week.
I loved these jeans so much! They were just the right amount of baggy and very comfortable:) loved the look of them and can go with many things due to color, and also go well with all sorts of shoes!

They are good jeans overall but there is no hole for the button they fit well though they have lines at the top of them and they don’t have they white part by the knees they are not the right color they don’t look like the picture the material is good though I do have to cut a hole for the button though they are a little smaller than I thought they would be but overall are pretty comfy and they say they are mud waist but they are very high waist but they are good material

It’s silly to expect any differently these days, I suppose, but the 2xl wouldn’t zip over my US standard size 10 waistline. They were very roomie throughout as expected and super cute, but the waist was more like a standard US 6. Make it make sense- And being disabled and without a printer means I am not able to exchange most items that don’t work out for me so these pants will be donated to a women’s shelter. Which is totally fine. Just for the next person who may be considering these adorable pants….  If you are over an American standard 6/8, these aren’t the pants for you. And probably not any other fellow under 5’4 person.  We are better left to petite and accurate sizing 😂😂

there are a few different pros and cons: they are very cute and i like them a lot. i will definitely get lots of use out of them. something i wasnt expecting was that there wasnt a hole to put the button thru, so i had to cut one myself. other than that they are great and i highly recommend!
I bought these in large for my teen daughter who wears a US size 12. They appear to be xtra small! I’m a 2/4 and they are even too small for me. Waste of money.
First pair my daughter got fpr her birthday and she loves it,the medium size fit her just right but if you want a more baggie fit you can order the next size up. Very good material too.

My daughter loved them they fit perfect I don't see them a little bit like they should in the picture but that's everything you buy online The only downside of it is it did not have the hole where you put the button through I had to literally make a hold for it but of all my daughter loved them and they fit perfect

评论概述: Seems to be good quality and comfort

评论详情: Really good quality fabric and a great fit. They are advertised as mid rise, But they are definitely on the higher rise side.
These baggy jeans are so on trend and so comfortable. Denim is soft and super comfortable. I'm going to order some more in different colors. Super happy with the purchase.
